B

BUILD_BRANCH_FILENAME - Static variable in class com.group21.ci.Config
File to save the name of the branch that was built and tested.

File to save the commit id (SHA) identifying the commit the repository was built from.

File for saving output from compilation and testing.

C

com.group21.ci - package com.group21.ci
Provides classes to create a continuous integration server that builds and tests a GitHub repository.

S

sanitize(String) - Static method in class com.group21.ci.TextSanitizer
Sanitizes text by removing illegal characters Allowed characters: a-z, A-Z, numbers, - and _
sendErrorStatus() - Method in class com.group21.ci.StatusSender
Send a POST request to the repo to set commit status to error, with a short description to indicate that the CI crashed.
sendFailureStatus() - Method in class com.group21.ci.StatusSender
Send a POST request to the repo to set commit status to failure, with a short description to indicate that a problem occurred and the CI was unsuccessful.
sendPendingStatus() - Method in class com.group21.ci.StatusSender
Send a POST request to the repo to set commit status to pending, with a short description to indicate that the CI is currently running.
sendSuccessStatus() - Method in class com.group21.ci.StatusSender
Send a POST request to the repo to set commit status to success, with a short description to indicate that the CI finished successfully.
StatusSender - Class in com.group21.ci
A class for sending commit statuses to GitHub.
StatusSender(RepositoryInfo, String) - Constructor for class com.group21.ci.StatusSender
Construct a StatusSender with the specified repository and id.
